program teste;
var
x, y : real;
qwerty : boolean;
WTF : real; //comentario

begin
{trecho
comentado
}
  read (x, qwerty);

  if (y <= not x)
    then
      begin
        qwerty :=  false;
        write(y < 22, x = 1)
      end
  else
      begin
        qwerty := true
      end

end
